metadata.description:
This rootPass will be used in order to claim a Cryptorunner from the [2112.run](http://2112.run) Genesis Cryptorunners collection once it is released. 

Cryptorunners are talented hackers that run against the Corporations of the [2112.run](http://2112.run) Universe. 

These are the key to the entire project ecosystem, and the playable characters of the Game.
metadata.name: Cryptorunner rootPass
